info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 5:56PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL WARD AND SOUTH CENTRAL RENVILLE COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM CDT... At 555 PM CDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Berthold, or 17 miles west of Minot, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Berthold around 600 PM CDT. Foxholm around 610 PM CDT. Carpio around 615 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
